class flask_app.forms.SearchForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_wtf.form.FlaskForm

class flask_app.forms.SerializeScheduleForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_wtf.form.FlaskForm

Form to serialize the current schedule for the user to copy, to be loaded later. Form also loads serialized data that was previously copied

class flask_app.forms.ViewSectionsForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_wtf.form.FlaskForm
